global.nUploadedChapters: {count, plural, one {1 uploaded chapter} other {{count} uploaded chapters}}

username.min3Characters: The username must be at least 3 characters
username.max30Characters: The username must be at most 30 characters

email.max100Characters: The email must be at most 100 characters

password.min8Character: The password must be at least 8 characters
password.max50Characters: The password must be at most 50 characters

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: You seem to be lost. You'd better go back to the home page.
notFound.action: Go back to the home page

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.error: An unexpected error occurred when creating your account

signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.error: An unexpected error occurred when signing in

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions on how to redefine your password.
forgotPassword.error: An unexpected error occurred when sending the reset email

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.description: This is the final step. Please enter your new password below.
resetPassword.success: Your password has been reset successfully.
resetPassword.error: An unexpected error occurred when resetting your password

missingToken.title: Missing token
missingToken.description: You shouldn't be seeing this. If you think this is a bug, please report it in the Discord server.

magicLinkSent.title: Magic link sent
magicLinkSent.description1: Please check your inbox for a magic link.
magicLinkSent.description2: We either just sent you a magic link, or you already had one sent to you in the last minute. If you didn't receive anything, please wait another minute and try again.

verificationEmailSent.title: Verification email sent
verificationEmailSent.description1: Please check your inbox for a verification link.
verificationEmailSent.description2: We either just sent you a verification email, or you already had one sent to you in the last hour. If you didn't receive anything, please wait another hour and try again.

resetPasswordEmailSent.title: Reset password email sent
resetPasswordEmailSent.description1: Please check your inbox for a reset password link.
resetPasswordEmailSent.description2: If there is an account associated with this email, you will receive an email with instructions on how to reset your password. If you don't receive anything, please wait a few minutes and try again.

password.strength: {score, select, 0 {Enter a password} 1 {Weak password} 2 {Medium password} 3 {Strong password} other {Enter a password}}. Must contain:

errors.userNotFound: This email is not registered. Please sign up first
errors.emailAlreadyExists: This email is already taken. Please reset your password if you've forgotten it
errors.usernameAlreadyExists: This username is already taken. Please choose another one
errors.invalidEmail: The email is invalid. Are you using a disposable email?
errors.invalidUsername: The username is invalid. It can only contain letters, numbers, underscores and dots
errors.invalidEmailOrPassword: Your email or password is incorrect. Please try again
errors.invalidUsernameOrPassword: Your username or password is incorrect. Please try again
errors.emailNotVerified: Your email is not verified. An email has been sent to you for verification
errors.verificationEmailAlreadySent: Please check your inbox for a verification email. If you don't see it, please wait a few minutes and try again.
errors.invalidToken: The token is invalid. Maybe it has expired. Please try requesting a new password reset link.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: You have made too many requests. Please try again later.

accountNotLinked.title: Account linking disabled
accountNotLinked.description: You just tried to sign in with Discord or Google, but this email address is already linked to another account. Please sign in with the same provider as the other account. If you really want to sign in with this provider, you can link your accounts in the settings.

unknown.title: Oh no, something went wrong
unknown.description: We don't know what went wrong. Please try again later. If the problem persists, please report it in the Discord server.
